heading: Discover
subheading: Instantly track articles covered by Open Access research policies.
p: We discover articles and data using open scholarly metadata, targeted text and data mining, and an institution’s internal data sources.

heading: Analyze
subheading: Gain a clearer understanding of whether and how articles comply.
p: We transparently analyse those articles against all the terms of the institution’s current policy, or custom criteria, to provide detailed statistics and key insights.

heading: Unlock
subheading: Directly act upon research outputs and articles, promoting systemic changes.
p: We help libraries and funders unlock individual articles as they’re published by making outreach a one-click process, and help build evidence for systemic changes.
